question: . You want to buy some computers. Therefore, write to a vendor seeking information and price quotation for the same. In your letter • introduce yourself • give details on what types of computers you are looking for • request the quotation
text: My name is Vivek, I own a start-up company cloud nine technologies. I would like to get a quote for purchasing computers for my organization.

I am  looking for a desktop with Mac and Windows operating systems installed on it. As we will be performing the heavy data operation we are looking for a system that will have a 16 GB ram. In addition to that, I am looking for 8 core CPU for windows and M chip CPU for mac which helps in boosting the performance. Moreover, our system architect recommended getting a detached CPU which will reduce the cost. Could you please share  the quote with all the prices listed down?
By the way, my colleague from my previous organization referred your company for purchasing materials as your service is excellent.
